lyrics.stanza: Revelation Twenty-Two Verse Sixteen, Seventeen say, I Jesus have sent My angel To testify to you these things, these things For the churches. I am the Root And the Offspring of David, The bright morning star, The bright morning star.

And the Spirit and the bride say, Come! And let him who hears say, Come! Come! And let him who is thirsty come, Thirsty come, thirsty come; Let him who wills, wills, wills Take the water of life, Take the water of life Freely, freely.
